Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Heat sugar and water together in a small saucepan over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until sugar dissolves into a light brown caramel, 8 to 10 minutes. Pour into a round glass baking dish.

Directions.3: Place condensed milk, evaporated milk, eggs, cream cheese, and vanilla extract in a blender; blend into a smooth custard. Pour over caramelized sugar in the baking dish.

Directions.4: Place baking dish in a deep baking pan. Pour in enough water to reach halfway up the baking dish.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until custard is set and top is light brown, about 1 hour.

Directions.6: Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate until cold, 3 to 4 hours.
